revised_title: Experimental Study of Wave Growth on Water due to Wind Action
tldr: This paper presents an experimental study on the growth of waves on water due to wind action. The authors constructed models to investigate the behavior of water surfaces under wind pressure and measured the distribution of normal pressure on the surface of a wooden model of waves. The study aimed to provide experimental data for understanding the complex problem of wave formation by wind.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Fluid Dynamics
